metadata.name: Kokeshi Green
metadata.description:
ORIGO invented the 1st Kokeshi Style of Contemporary Digital Fashion with ultimate elegance.

It is a Japanese-Style digital fashion NFT
created by shiu_studio in collaboration with ORIGO.

This capsule collection has been launched into futuristic fashion, contemporary silhouette, and cyber ambience, where through the process of exploring and re-depicting the unique Japanese craftsmanship and object such as Kokeshi.

https://www.instagram.com/shiu_studio/
